item.title: Here's how RFK Jr.'s hand-picked vaccine advisory committee is starting to reshape vaccine policy
item.description: A federal vaccine advisory committee signaled a new approach to U.S. vaccine policy after a two-day meeting.

item.title: What does the CDC panel vote on childhood vaccine changes mean?
item.description: Will Stone summarizes the CDC advisory committee's rollback of two vaccines for kids and the restrictions on the COVID-19 vaccine.

item.title: 'We are rookies': Day 2 of CDC vaccine meeting opens with a reversal and a surprise
